Trade/Device Name(s): Tyson Bio HT100 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Tyson Bio HT100-B Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Tyson Bio HT100 Blood Glucose Meter
Tyson Bio HT100-B Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Tyson Bio HT100 and HT100-B Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems using electrochemical biosensor technology for self-monitoring of blood glucose in diabetic patients.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm for self-testing by people with diabetes to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
